WorkItem.Description: I'm attaching my character profile for my feral druid. It seems to be calculating in 3000 extra mastery which is throwing the optimizer off, unless I'm reading this wrong...

Comments.Message: I guess I should mention that my character page shows 1833 Mastery and Rawr is showing 4833.
3000 mastery comes from buffs I think.

You have told Rawr that you have the Blessing of Might (paladin) or Grace of Air (Shaman) buff which is 3000 mastery.    If you are comparing to your toon in-game when you are unbuffed then the 1833 to 4833 that difference is correct.
Bah!  Sorry, I can't get used to the fact that new replies appear at the top.  I thought you responded after Kavan and hadn't understood his reply - my bad.
